channel.title: Python on drasyl is a high-performance framework for rapid development of distributed applications
channel.description: Recent content in Python on drasyl is a high-performance framework for rapid development of distributed applications

item.title: Python Package
item.description: Our libdrasyl allows us to build performant and native wrappers for languages other than Java and without the JVM. Accordingly, we are happy to present you our first wrapper in Python. The wrapper includes the necessary binaries for easy integration and is available as a Python package at pypi.org.
